content:
State

State

  • The state of an object is one of the possible conditions in which an object may exist
  • State is represented by the values of the properties of an object at a given time
  • The state of an object normally changes over time
    • Leaf counter 3
    • VHS Player Rewinding
    • Overhead Projector On
    • Laptop battery Low
    • My bank account Overdrawn
    • My car Stalled
    • My cat Sleeping
